import React, { useState } from "react"; import CoinItem from "./CoinItem"; import Coin from "../routes/Coin"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Coins.css"; const Coins = (props) => { const [search, setSearch] = useState(""); return (
setSearch(e.target.value)} />

{props.coins .filter( (item) => item.symbol.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) || item.name.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()) ) .map((coins) => { return ( } key={coins.id}> ); })}
); }; export default Coins;
